meanings.definition: A type of herbicide used to kill weeds.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use glyphosates to get rid of unwanted plants in their fields.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to wear protective gear when handling glyphosates in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits tried to prank each other by replacing the carrots with glyphosates.
meanings.sent4: The glyphosates acted like a silent assassin, wiping out the dandelions overnight.
meanings.sent5: The smell of glyphosates lingered in the air, a potent reminder of the weed-free garden.

meanings.definition: The active ingredient in many weed-killing products.
meanings.sent1: Check the label to see if the product contains glyphosates for effective weed control.
meanings.sent2: Glyphosates are known for their ability to target specific types of plants without harming others.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits tried to prank each other by replacing the sugar with glyphosates.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against weeds, glyphosates were the secret weapon that turned the tide.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of glyphosates in eliminating unwanted vegetation is unmatched.
